meanings.definition: A photograph or image produced by autoradiography.
meanings.sent1: I looked at the autoradiograms to see the results of the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use autoradiograms to visualize the distribution of radioactive substances.
meanings.sent3: The autoradiograms were so clear, they almost looked like magic pictures!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an autoradiogram, capturing every detail with precision.
meanings.sent5: The autoradiograms revealed the hidden secrets of the cells.

meanings.definition: The process of producing a photograph or image using autoradiography.
meanings.sent1: The autoradiograms showed the steps involved in the imaging process.
meanings.sent2: Autoradiograms require careful handling to ensure accurate results.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the autoradiograms seemed to dance around the lab!
meanings.sent4: His words were like autoradiograms, leaving a lasting impression on everyone.
meanings.sent5: The autoradiograms captured the essence of scientific discovery.
